    • Uses of ConvexPolygon2DReadOnly in us.ihmc.euclid.geometry.interfaces

      Subinterfaces of ConvexPolygon2DReadOnly in us.ihmc.euclid.geometry.interfaces 
      Modifier and Type Interface Description
      interface  ConvexPolygon2DBasics
      Write and read interface for a convex polygon defined in the XY-plane.
      Methods in us.ihmc.euclid.geometry.interfaces with parameters of type ConvexPolygon2DReadOnly 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      default boolean ConvexPolygon2DReadOnly.epsilonEquals​(ConvexPolygon2DReadOnly other, double epsilon)
      Tests on a per-component basis on every vertices if this convex polygon is equal to other with the tolerance epsilon.
      default boolean ConvexPolygon2DReadOnly.equals​(ConvexPolygon2DReadOnly other)
      Tests on a per vertex and per component basis, if this polygon is exactly equal to other.
      default boolean ConvexPolygon2DReadOnly.geometricallyEquals​(ConvexPolygon2DReadOnly other, double epsilon)
      Compares this and other to determine if the two convex polygons are geometrically similar.
      default us.ihmc.euclid.tuple2D.interfaces.Point2DBasics[] Line2DReadOnly.intersectionWith​(ConvexPolygon2DReadOnly convexPolygon)
      Computes the coordinates of the possible intersection(s) between this line and the given convex polygon 2D.
      default int Line2DReadOnly.intersectionWith​(ConvexPolygon2DReadOnly convexPolygon, us.ihmc.euclid.tuple2D.interfaces.Point2DBasics firstIntersectionToPack, us.ihmc.euclid.tuple2D.interfaces.Point2DBasics secondIntersectionToPack)
      Computes the coordinates of the possible intersection(s) between this line and the given convex polygon 2D.
      default us.ihmc.euclid.tuple2D.interfaces.Point2DBasics[] LineSegment2DReadOnly.intersectionWith​(ConvexPolygon2DReadOnly convexPolygon)
      Computes the coordinates of the possible intersection(s) between a given line segment 2D and this convex polygon 2D.
      default int LineSegment2DReadOnly.intersectionWith​(ConvexPolygon2DReadOnly convexPolygon, us.ihmc.euclid.tuple2D.interfaces.Point2DBasics firstIntersectionToPack, us.ihmc.euclid.tuple2D.interfaces.Point2DBasics secondIntersectionToPack)

      class  FrameConvexPolygon2D

      interface  FixedFrameConvexPolygon2DBasics
      Write and read interface for a convex polygon defined in the XY-plane and that is expressed in an immutable reference frame.
      interface  FrameConvexPolygon2DBasics
      Write and read interface for a convex polygon defined in the XY-plane and that is expressed in in a changeable reference frame, i.e.
      interface  FrameConvexPolygon2DReadOnly
      Read-only interface for a convex polygon defined in the XY-plane expressed in an immutable reference frame.
